name: Hilton Garden Inn Bali Ngurah Rai Airport
detail: We chose to stay here for one night before leaving on a flight the next day, and we are so glad that we did! Room was perfect and the breakfast was great (excellent coffee- something that I didnâ€™t realize would be difficult to come by at hotels in Bali. The pool is stunning and huge. I ordered an amazing cocktail to the pool - a raspberry Tom Collins. Great business centre to print boarding passes. A+!

name: The ONE Legian Hotel
detail: AT first glance, the hotel has a very modern chic new look, a place for urbanites with a Starbucks right at the lobby. A great feature for those accustomed to their regular Joe's even away on vacation. The lobby/reception area is spacious unlike most Bali hotels, with a few helpdesk. However, the check-in was a bit slow (couldn't find my booking) but everything was sorted in the end. The room was a pleasant surprised, everything looks clean, crisp and modern, albeit the size a bit smaller than usual. Amenities are adequate, i especially like the ziplock bag with tooth brushes and 2 tubes of toothpaste, which i can reuse for future travels. WIFI was excellent in the room and generally the whole hotel. I managed to do my work without any interference. One qualm about the hotel though, some of the staff (bell & security) seems to practice double standards, favoring the foreigners and ignoring the Asians. This was tested twice when i tried to get a cab, the staff opted to help the foreigners first, even though i was first in line.

name: J4 Hotels Legian
detail: When im in Bali this is the hotel i will go to. Best for solo or travelling with kids. Its located in the centre of legian street. Rooms are clean.The staffs and securities are friendly too. The only problem is to get to this place if you travel by car. Its the traffic. I would recommend this place for any types of traveller.

name: Legian Beach Hotel
detail: Great rooms, awesome location and overall a fantastic hotel.

name: Ramada Encore by Wyndham Seminyak Bali
detail: I have stayed in this hotel more than 5 times. In general, the staff are attentive, friendly and warm. For example; I was greeted by name before checking in. Everything runs with a system. Not much waiting required. I have stayed in 7 different 4* hotels in Bali and this is by far one of the best value for money and comfortable one. Located in a quieter spot in seminyak but 10 minutes drive from seminyak square. I like that because you don't hear loud music or traffic. Walls are generally thin so if your room is near the lift lobby, you can hear conversations or footsteps. Pick a room further away from the lift if you are a light sleeper. Service staff are generally nice and warm. They will provide assistance in a jiffy without having to wait Long. I avoid breakfast in the hotel not because it's not good but I love to venture cafes. The breakfast selection in the hotel is decent.

name: HARRIS Hotel Seminyak
detail: When we arrived at the Harris, we were greeted by Nico who made our check in a breeze. He was very freindly and gave us a fantastic first impression of the hotel. We booked a unique room which was brilliant - balcony, large comfy bed, great flat screen TV with heaps of channels, lots of space and great bathroom. The wifi at the hotel is fab, you only have to log in once a day. There are 5 swimming pools at this hotel, the flying pool is a little piece of heaven. The hotel is spotless, very clean. No matter what time of the day we left our room, within an hour of returing the room had be cleaned, fresh towels and complimentary water everyday. The location was great for us, 10 minute stroll to double six beach and all the bars. We took the complimentary buggy ride to the beach where the hotel has private sun beds for guests to use in the best location, they also provide free beach towels too. A ten minute walk in the other direction will take you to the Main Street in Seminyak. The buffet breakfasts in the hotel where a triumph, so much choice and the staff, every morning so friendly. The pizza restaurant was joy!! Awesome Italian style pizza, beautiful fresh salads, nice wine and great service. On the street where the hotel is located there are also a number of bars and restaurants, an awesome bakery and coffee shop, as well as spa's and a mini mart and circle k right on the doorstep - so convenient. We extended our stay for a further couple of nights, and stayed a week in total and we still don't want to leave. I have to commend the management for hiring such great people, the staff here are all so wonderful, always a smile and a hello and eager to help with anything you need. Having stayed in many hotels in Bali, the Harris is the highlight for us, and we can't wait to come back. Our friend is getting married and we have recommend the Harris to all our friends also coming to bali for the wedding. Thank you for such a wonderful stay ðŸ˜ƒ

name: HARRIS Hotel Kuta Tuban Bali
detail: Arrived late evening and left the following lunch before travelling on elsewhere. The staff are very helpful and friendly. Rooms are well furnished and have ample tv channels, air con etc. The room service is 24 hours which is a real blessing. The spa within the hotel is great and so is the pool. They have a shuttle service to and from the airport so you can let them know your flight details and they will collect you. Be careful, there is more than one Harris Hotel in Bali and this is the only one near the airport. Hot water could have bee hotter.

name: Jambuluwuk Oceano Seminyak Hotel
detail: I loved the location of his hotel as it was convenient for everyone for our family of 5, even walking distance to seminyak beach . We had two small children 4&6 and they enjoyed the playroom which was free for staying guests . The pool was great too as they had a slide . Wish we stayed longer at this hotel as we only stayed 3 nights . Will book this hotel again in the future . Staff were friendly too. Cons : the lobby is airy so you will get some bugs here and there which is normal in Bali so just make sure you keep the door shut so they donâ€™t enter the room. Other than that everything was perfect !

name: FOX Hotel Jimbaran Beach Bali
detail: well worth it. super friendly staff, i think Bali people are friendly in general. superb food (really cheap and tasty) unique buffet brkfast, ala carte/buffet style. you get to order 2 sets of the ala carte menu and they have a buffet spread too. swimming pool was magnificent, comfortably warm at night (prolly due to the hear from before nightfall) beach is nearby. would book here again if i return to bali

name: Hilton Bali Resort
detail: it is one of the best hotel in Bali. It has comfortable room, good food, big, nice, children friendly pool. It has private nice beach, you can see sun rise in this hotel. It is far from town. the internet is fast but for 30 minutes only - you need to reconnect after 30 minutes.
